Summary: Spectacular Pulsating Blue, Red, Green lights spanning 1-2 miles in width
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving east on route 17 in NYS approaching NYS Thruway tolls at Harriman. Triangular light formation at dusk. Widening and contracting for 3-4 minutes. This was then followed by spectacular event of 15-20 pulsating lights, each of tremendous size spanning over a mile in width. The large lights were pulsating much like an airport runway and each light was tremendous in size. Lasted for a minute. This was above the Harriman state park mountains, away from the Woodbury outlets and stewart airport. A truly spectacular event that cannot be understood. Only one other witness. Trying to find more witnesses.
